meanings.definition: To go for a walk outside.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy outwalking in the park every morning.
meanings.sent2: She outwalked to the store to buy some groceries.
meanings.sent3: The dog was outwalking happily with its owner in the sunshine.
meanings.sent4: The children were outwalking through the forest, exploring nature's wonders.
meanings.sent5: Outwalking in the fresh air always lifts my spirits.

meanings.sent1: Outwalking is a great way to stay active and enjoy nature.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of friends outwalking together in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The outwalking event in the park attracted many participants.
meanings.sent4: The outwalking trail offers beautiful views of the surrounding mountains.
meanings.sent5: The peacefulness of outwalking helps clear my mind.
